content: Drilling stand DD-HD 30 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Built-in fine feed – making drilling less tiring during sustained operation Angular drilling – easy, stepless adjustment up to 45° Comprehensive range of accessories available – such as vacuum pads, spacers, cross column, jack screws, fastening kits Easy set-up – tool-free quick-connection of drive unit Applications Drilling range up to 300 mm diameter without spacers Drilling range up to 600 mm diameter with spacers Coring at angles of up to 45° Can be fastened by anchor, using the optional vacuum pad or with the jack screw ### TECHNICAL DATA: Fixation mode: Anchor and vacuum (optional) Angular coring: Yes Column extension: Yes Technical Data | Fixation mode | Anchor and vacuum (optional) | Angular coring | Yes | Column extension | Yes | For use with | DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA | Weight | 47.18 lb | Base plate dimensions (LxW) | 16.1 x 10.7 in | Drill Stand Height | 42.8 in | Extendable diameter capacity | Yes | Additional Accessory Information | Drill stand for DD 200, DD 250, DD 350-CA and DD 500-CA | Product information | Drill stand for DD 200, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA and DD 500-CA and autofeed unit DD-AF CA ### ITEMS- 2148548 - Drilling stand DD-HD 30 - Package Size 1 pc
